name: Keka/love
greetingText: As I sit here thinking about you, a wave of warmth washes over me.
wishText: You are my world, and seeing you happy fills my heart. Your love is all that matters ;)
text1: I want to make you the happiest woman in the world.
textInChatBox: Thank you for everything blah blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
wishHeading: Thank you for being part of my life!
outroText: You're my best friend, my confidante, and the love of my life. Thank you for being you.
replayText: Click here, if you want to watch it again.
